channel.title: Is Becoming A Member Worth It?
channel.description:
Well just like the question says, I've been pondering this for a while now because its damned tempting for a main.
Leave comments as to why you think it is/isnt worth it :D.
<3

item.title: Is Becoming A Member Worth It?

Yeah it is, i just got my lil autoers to cut heaps of yews then got my main to fletch em then high alch them :D… And more places to auto with out noobs reporting u :P.[br][size=1]Posted at: May 09, 2006, 01:59:23 am[/size][hr]Yeah it is, i just got my lil autoers to cut heaps of yews then got my main to fletch em then high alch them :D… And more places to auto with out noobs reporting u :P.

item.title: Is Becoming A Member Worth It?
item.dc:creator: @Snipe Snipe
item.description:
@Snipe wrote:

The only place I know of is Reinet. I’d have to buy it for you though, since they aren’t letting anyone else join right now.

What happens is, someone gets a pin by calling a 1 800 number and the number charges so much toward your phone bill, and they give you a pin. You go to RS and type in the pin and you get a month of membership.

On the forum the seller gives his pin to a middle man, the buyer gives the money to the middle man, then he tells you the pin, then gives the money to the seller.

Right now some guy is giving unlimited membership for 6 mil. I don’t know if I’d go for that or not, though. He’s a vet and used to be the admin of the place, and alot of people are swearing by him, but I’d be a bit weary of it.

Most of the pins are 1.2 to 1.4mil each.[br][size=1]Posted at: April 28, 2006, 12:30:57 am[/size][hr]Oh sorry, this is how it works:

Buying a PBP PIN #:

[1] - Get a seller!
[2] - GET A MM! It takes a while to get everything set up, so after you find a PBP seller, find a MM.
[3] - Once you, the seller, and the MM are all in the same MSN conversation, give the MM the Cash/Item(s)/Character(s) that you are trading for the PIN.
[4] - After that you tell the MM the character’s username and password you want to get p2p on.
[5] - Then the MM gets The Country, The Phone # & The PIN # from the seller.
[6] - Now the MM logs on your character & makes it p2p. If everything works, he gives the Cash/Item(s)/Character(s) to the seller.

Read full topic
item.source: Is Becoming A Member Worth It?

item.dc:creator: @iruleatants iruleatants
item.description:
@iruleatants wrote:

agreed

i was a member for 6 months then i stoped for a month, and i couldnt survive… so little you could do, you dont got the coal mines with like 20 rock, you have like no quests to do, and all the stuff you want is in use, thats jagexs way of getting money(its soo addicative)

item.source: Is Becoming A Member Worth It?

item.title: Is Becoming A Member Worth It?
item.dc:creator: @intheknow intheknow
item.description:
@intheknow wrote:

Eventually it will become a necessity though. How the hell people continue to play f2p after members confuses me. The map is tiny, the items are limited, and there is nothing to do but pray the monsters, ores, trees, etc. aren’t taken. Not to mention a heap of folks on free world have no clue about the game. Just my $0.02.

Read full topic
item.source: Is Becoming A Member Worth It?

item.title: Is Becoming A Member Worth It?
item.dc:creator: @iruleatants iruleatants
item.description:
@iruleatants wrote:

being a member is total worth it, there is this cool plave called the fight cave, u can fight over and over each time u die u lose nothing and spawn outside, so u can level like hell using it, then you can use the tokkul they give u for choas runes at the rune store. also the member quest reward you so much better, and silk sells at 60gp each!!! plus you get to make your own arrows, and you can law run for free law runes… wow being a member is AWSOME

oh and that not all you can do

Read full topic

KyleGut3:

PBP pin?

Pay by phone pin its the easiest way but beware. Its better of paying 1.2 mill for a shop like persoin who sells heaps of pins then paying 900k to someone who is sellign there first pin and only pin

On whether to get one. I found members heaps of fun. I wish i could still afford a pin. Before i bought one i thought it would be gay but it was cool as
